resources.string: Please insert the USB storage device which has the correct firmware file in it, and select “YES” for upgrade.

string-array.name: str_arr_update_status
string-array.item: Please insert a USB memory device!

resources.string: To save energy,after 5s the TV will switch off the screen.To watch tv again,press a key on the remote control.
